trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of provider objects that inherit from <xref href="System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示从继承的提供程序对象的集合<xref href="System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The ProviderCollection class utilizes an underlying <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object to store the provider name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: ProviderCollection 类利用基础<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>对象来存储提供程序名称/值对。</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The ProviderCollection constructor initializes the underlying <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object used to store the items of the collection.
trans-unit.target: ProviderCollection 构造函数初始化基础<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>用于存储集合的项的对象。</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: Adds a provider to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 向集合中添加提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The Add method first checks for any exceptions (as listed in the Exceptions section), and then calls the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法首先检查任何异常 （如在异常部分中列出），然后调用<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It passes in the object referenced by the `provider` parameter as well as the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> property of the provider to be used as the key in the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object.
trans-unit.target: 将所引用的对象中传递`provider`参数以及<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A>属性作为键中使用的提供程序<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>对象。</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> </xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The provider to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 集合是只读的。

trans-unit.source: provider is .
trans-unit.target: provideris .

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 删除集合中的所有项。

trans-unit.source: The collection is set to read-only.
trans-unit.target: 集合设置为只读的。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the collection to the given array starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将集合的内容复制到给定数组的指定索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: The array into which the items are copied must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 将这些项复制到该数组必须具有从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The array to copy the elements of the collection to.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到集合中的元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The index of the collection item at which to start the copying process.
trans-unit.target: 在其中开始复制过程的集合项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of providers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中的提供程序的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of providers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的提供程序的数目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回实现的对象<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>来循环访问集合的接口。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection> class stores its collection in a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection>类存储在其集合<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>对象。</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> </xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection>

trans-unit.source: The GetEnumerator method calls the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: GetEnumerator 方法调用<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>来循环访问集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对集合的访问 （线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: This property is included to fulfill the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是包含在内，以满足<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the provider with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有指定名称的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The key by which the provider is identified.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序标识所依据的键。

trans-unit.source: The provider with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定名称的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Removes a provider from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The name of the provider to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的提供程序名称。

trans-unit.source: The collection has been set to read-only.
trans-unit.target: 集合已设置只读的。

trans-unit.source: Sets the collection to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 设置的集合是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection> class is read/write by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection>类为默认情况下的读/写。</xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection>

trans-unit.source: The SetReadOnly method makes the collection read-only.
trans-unit.target: SetReadOnly 方法将集合设置为只读的。

trans-unit.source: After a collection is set to read-only, some method calls (such as <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Remove%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Add%2A> will result in an exception.
trans-unit.target: 集合设置为只读后，某些方法调用 (如<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Remove%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Add%2A>将导致异常。</xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that most provider-based features will set their <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection> object to read-only after creating instances of all of the configured providers.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，大多数基于提供程序的功能将设置其<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection>为只读之后创建的配置提供程序的所有实例的对象。</xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current object.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is included to fulfill the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是包含在内，以满足<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection"></xref> to an array, starting at a particular array index.
trans-unit.target: 元素复制<xref href="System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection"></xref>到一个数组中从特定的数组索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the ICollection.CopyTo instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 ICollection.CopyTo 实例被强制转换为时，才可以使用它<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The array to copy the elements of the collection to.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到集合中的元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The index of the array at which to start copying provider instances from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在开始从集合中复制提供程序实例数组的索引。
